content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We consider taking responsibility and being accountable for the work we do. It is a key to bringing valuable results to our clients.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"During our everyday work in the distributed environments, we value professionalism, honesty, transparency and willingness to go extra mile to make things done.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We partnership on development with the client, where communication is a key aspect in our work for delivering first-class engineering services.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":69615,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7e936462-7a4e-4f42-8726-300bff663eb5/21.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7e936462-7a4e-4f42-8726-300bff663eb5/21.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"21.PNG\",\"name\":\"21.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7e936462-7a4e-4f42-8726-300bff663eb5\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":907,\"height\":325},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
